feed.title: Google Cloud: Dataproc Metastore
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Dataproc Metastore

entry.content: Multi-region and custom dual region support for Dataproc Metastore is deprecated. You can no longer create new multi-region or custom dual region services. Existing services will continue to function.
entry.summary: Support for multi-region and custom dual region Dataproc Metastore services is now deprecated. New services of these types cannot be created, though existing ones will remain operational.
entry.title: Deprecated: Dataproc Metastore regional support deprecated

entry.content: Backported HIVE-26882 to version 3.1.2. Hive Metastore now supports performing transactional checks of table parameters before altering a table.
entry.summary: Hive Metastore now supports transactional checks for table parameters before alterations.
entry.title: Changed: Hive Metastore Transactional Checks

entry.content: Backported HIVE-28121 to version 3.1.2. Hive Metastore now uses direct SQL for transactionally altering table parameters.
entry.summary: Hive Metastore now uses direct SQL for transactional table parameter alterations, incorporating HIVE-28121 into version 3.1.2.
entry.title: Changed: Hive Metastore Transactional Alteration
